DOC.brief_summary: This cohort study aims to assess the quality of life (or welfare) related to the health of children and adolescents with an non genetics auto-inflammatory disease PFAPA or Marshall syndrome to compare it to children or adolescents with recurrent fever genetics of Familial Mediterranean fever (FMF) in order to improve their overall care.
DOC.brief_title: Life Quality Study for PFAPA Patient
DOC.criteria: PFAPA syndrome patients or FMF patients Participation refusal
